headline: Worst environmental disasters caused by humans
text: Humans have been responsible for some of the most catastrophic environmental occurrences in history. War, nuclear blasts, chemical spills, poisonous gas leaks, and oil spills are among the catastrophes. When these catastrophes happen, the environmental implications are severe, and the effects last for hundreds of years.

headline: Enviromental disasers
text: Many people might give different definitions of "enviromental disasters" but Wikipedia gives a full definition.
